statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT make, model FROM vehicle_information WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT owner_name, miles_driven FROM vehicle_information WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT make, year FROM vehicle_information WHERE miles_driven > 50000;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicle_information WHERE miles_driven < 50000 ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
SELECT owner_name, miles_driven FROM vehicle_information WHERE make = 'Toyota' OR make = 'Honda' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_information WHERE owner_name LIKE 'J%' AND year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY year ASC, make DESC;
SELECT make, model, miles_driven FROM vehicle_information WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY miles_driven DESC, make ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT VIN, make, model FROM Vehicles WHERE make='Toyota';
SELECT MAX(mileage) AS max_mileage FROM Vehicles;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium > 500.00 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT make, model, year, VIN FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT policy_id, premium, deductible FROM Policies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, VIN, mileage FROM Vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year < 2015 ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date, deductible FROM Policies WHERE deductible >= 500 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT make, model, year, VIN, mileage FROM Vehicles WHERE make IN ('Ford', 'Chevrolet') AND mileage < 50000 ORDER BY make, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInformation;
SELECT make, model, year FROM VehicleInformation;
SELECT vin_number, make FROM VehicleInformation;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicy WHERE policy_type = 'Comprehensive';
SELECT holder_id, name, address FROM PolicyHolder;
SELECT make, model, year FROM VehicleInformation WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT * FROM VehicleInformation WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year = 2015;

SELECT vi.make, vi.model, ip.start_date, ip.end_date, ip.premium_amount FROM VehicleInformation vi JOIN InsurancePolicy ip ON vi.vehicle_id = ip.vehicle_id WHERE ip.policy_type = 'Comprehensive' ORDER BY ip.start_date DESC;

SELECT ph.name, ph.address, vi.make, vi.model, ip.policy_type, ip.premium_amount FROM PolicyHolder ph JOIN VehicleInformation vi ON ph.holder_id = vi.vehicle_id JOIN InsurancePolicy ip ON vi.vehicle_id = ip.vehicle_id WHERE vi.year < 2015;
SELECT ip.policy_type, COUNT(*) as policies_count FROM InsurancePolicy ip GROUP BY ip.policy_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY policies_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles;
SELECT model, make, year FROM Vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT driver_id, name, age, license_number FROM Drivers WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE premium > 500.00;
SELECT claim_id, date_filed, description, amount FROM Claims;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' AND year > 2015
SELECT Drivers.name, Vehicles.make, Vehicles.model FROM Drivers JOIN Vehicles ON Drivers.driver_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE Drivers.age > 30
SELECT Policies.*, Drivers.name AS driver_name FROM Policies JOIN Drivers ON Policies.driver_id = Drivers.driver_id WHERE Drivers.age < 25

SELECT Claims.claim_id, Claims.date_filed, Claims.amount, Policies.start_date, Policies.end_date FROM Claims JOIN Policies ON Claims.policy_id = Policies.policy_id WHERE Claims.amount > 500 ORDER BY Policies.end_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000;
SELECT first_name, last_name, birth_date FROM drivers WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT city, state FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT DISTINCT make FROM vehicles ORDER BY make DESC;
SELECT vehicles.make, vehicles.year, drivers.first_name, drivers.last_name FROM vehicles INNER JOIN drivers ON vehicles.vehicle_id = drivers.driver_id;
SELECT v.make, v.model, c.claim_date, c.claim_amount FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN claims c ON v.vehicle_id = c.policy_id;
